feature_short_description: Scan and process multiple invoices in batch mode for improved efficiency
feature_description:
## Batch Scanning

Batch Scanning allows you to process multiple invoices simultaneously, significantly improving efficiency when handling large volumes of documents.

### Capabilities
- Multi-file upload and processing
- Parallel document processing
- Bulk data extraction
- Batch status tracking
- Progress notifications

### Workflow
1. Upload multiple documents (ZIP, folder, or individual files)
2. System automatically processes all invoices in parallel
3. Monitor processing progress in real-time
4. Download results when complete

### Benefits
- Process 100+ invoices in minutes
- Reduce manual handling time
- Consistent data extraction
- Ideal for month-end closes or vendor onboarding
